text: Mirza Bašić was the defending champion but chose not to participate. Illya Marchenko won the title after defeating Ilya Ivashka 6–4, 6–4 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Guzzini Challenger - Singles Category:Guzzini Challenger
title: 2016 Guzzini Challenger – Singles
